title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed (two reds, two purples, blue, yellow) on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 25.5 x 24 cm (10 1/16 x 9 7/16 in.)
Repeat H (half-drop): 21.6 cm (8 1/2 in.)
description: Directional allover pattern of small flowers on a deep purple background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 18th century.
